text: Professor Vytautas Landsbergis (born 18 October 1932) is a Lithuanian conservative politician and a former Member of the European Parliament. He was the first head of state of Lithuania after its independence declaration from the Soviet Union, and served as the Head of the Lithuanian Parliament Seimas. ==References== ==Other websites== * Vytautas Landsbergis biography * The Restoration of Lithuanian Independence Freedom Collection interview Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Academics Category:Speakers of the Seimas Category:Lutherans Category:People from Kaunas Category:Presidents of Lithuania Category:MEPs for Lithuania
title: Vytautas Landsbergis
